title: Wow*4 bed/2 bath*PETS negotiable!*Open layout*1/2 FEE*Green C line*
posting_body: ['This is a beautiful, freshly painted 4 bed 2 bath unit in Brookline right near the Englewood Green C line train stop.', "There's only a HALF MONTH FEE!", 'Pets are negotiable for a fee.', 'Granite countertops, all updated appliances, dishwasher, modern open concept layout with kitchen, dining, and living room areas all connected with high ceilings.', "There's also a back porch, and it's located on the first floor making an easy move-in.", '(Well moving is never easy but EASIER!)', ' The whole apartment has been renovated.', "There's hardwood floors throughout and laundry in the building.", 'Please note: 1 of the bedrooms is extremely small.', 'You will see it first on the video tour.', 'It does have a closet but it would make a great office, or a room for someone with minimal stuff- size of a single in a dorm.', 'So for 3 people, or perhaps 4, this would make an excellent unit.', 'Great, safe location.', 'Also close to the B & C Green T lines, as well as several bus routes: 86, 51, & 65.', 'I believe parking is on street with permit.', 'Contact me today for a showing.', 'Virtual tour: https://youtu.be/xDyMzGjhlPwPublic link: <URL>', 'PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 273229189', 'Rent: $5,600 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 09/01/2022', 'Pet: Negotiable', 'Parking:: no parking', 'FEATURES', 'A/C', 'Central Air', 'Ceramic Tiles', 'Deck', 'Dining Room', 'Dishwasher', 'Fireplace (Decorative)', 'Granite Counter Tops', 'Hardwood Floors', 'High Ceiling', 'Laundry in Unit', 'Microwave', 'Modern Kitchen', 'New/Renovated Bath', 'New/Renovated Kitchen', 'New Appliances', 'Pantry', 'Porch', 'PROPERTY INFOID: 273229189Rent: $5,600 / MonthBeds: 4Bath: 2Available Date: 09/01/2022Pet:', 'NegotiableParking:: no parkingFEATURESA/CCentral AirCeramic TilesDeckDining RoomDishwasherFireplace (Decorative)Granite Counter TopsHardwood FloorsHigh CeilingLaundry in UnitMicrowaveModern KitchenNew/Renovated BathNew/Renovated KitchenNew AppliancesPantryPorch']
